positive_examples: This is an example of opening door.
The opening door demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed opening door in this context.
A typical case of opening door would involve these features.
The concept of opening door applies here.
The mechanical motion of moving a door from a closed to an open position.
negative_examples: This is an example of opening eyes, not opening door.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: OpeningEyes, or other types of Opening

definition: The action of moving a door to create a passage through a doorway.
